entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of snow. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. 60 percent chance of snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 5.
